title: How to Find a Job for Your Skill with SkillLot.com

steps.title: Click the 'Register' button to open the form to register your skill
steps.content: Click the 'Register' button to open the form to register your skill

steps.title: Fill the form and on the 'Skills' field, choose your skill from the drop down (if your skill is not in the listing, choose 'other' which gives a text field for you to provide your skill)
steps.content: Fill the form and on the 'Skills' field, choose your skill from the drop down (if your skill is not in the listing, choose 'other' which gives a text field for you to provide your skill)

steps.title: On the 'Locality' field, type in your locality
steps.content: On the 'Locality' field, type in your locality

steps.title: After registering, go to your provided email and click on the provided activation link to activate your skilllot.com account
steps.content: After registering, go to your provided email and click on the provided activation link to activate your skilllot.com account

steps.title: Once activated, your image appears on skilllot.com recent members section on the home page (A potential client can then search your skill within or beyond your locality using the search features)
steps.content: Once activated, your image appears on skilllot.com recent members section on the home page (A potential client can then search your skill within or beyond your locality using the search features)

steps.title: Remember you can always edit your profile to upload new photos, change skills, etc by logging in to your account and clicking 'Edit account'
steps.content: Remember you can always edit your profile to upload new photos, change skills, etc by logging in to your account and clicking 'Edit account' NOTE: Make sure your spellings, especially of your contacts details are correct.
